thread.title: Priyanka Chopra’s Craziest Beauty Experiment Till Date
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra’s Craziest Beauty Experiment Till Date

author: Natasha Patel
title: Priyanka Chopra’s Craziest Beauty Experiment Till Date
text:
Natasha Patel Mar . 31 . 2017 Priyanka Chopra (Source: Instagram | @PriyankaChopra) 
When a star like Priyanka Chopra get’s a new haircut, you can be assured that half the world will get a haircut too! But what if you knew the actual story behind her hair… Interesting, right? For their April issue, Vogue India caught up with the Quantico star and had the opportunity to ask her the most pressing beauty questions. Some of which were shared with us below: Vogue April Issue (Source: VogueIndia) Vogue April Issue (Source: VogueIndia) 
What did you find most interesting? Let us know in the comments below! 3
